radiographic_examinations.findings: Hypoplastic thyroid gland with 22 mm and 19 mm structures on both sides of the trachea at the age of 7 years.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Confirmed thyroid hypoplasia, heterogeneous structures with cystic malformations in follow-up ultrasound examinations.
Indicates potential structural defect in thyroid cells developed before that time point.
